Summary: picture taken of son standing on the edge of the grand canyon
divs: Sighting DetailsA friend of mine who I work with took a picture of his son standing at the edge of some rocks. He did not notice the object when he took the picture. When they got home and downloaded them that is when he noticed the object in the background. He showed me the picture and I told him he should report it. he didnt want to but said he wouldn't mind if I reported it. He doesnt want to reveal his name.
